text: Erich Theodore Barnes ( ;To Tell the Truth, Monday, November 11, 1963 - YouTube (via Buzzr). Retrieved January 4, 2019 July 4, 1935 â€“ April 29, 2022) was an American football defensive back in the National Football League. He was a six-time Pro Bowler. He was born in Elkhart, Indiana. He played for the Chicago Bears, New York Giants and Cleveland Browns. His career lasted from 1958 to 1971. Barnes died on April 29, 2022 from a long-illness in East Rutherford, New Jersey at the age of 86.Giants mourn passing of former DB Erich Barnes ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American football defensive ends Category:Chicago Bears players Category:New York Giants players Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:People from Elkhart, Indiana Category:Sportspeople from Indiana
title: Erich Barnes
